extracted_clauses: The Contractor shall provide the Services on a monthly basis commencing on the Effective Date.
The Customer shall pay the Contractor a fee of $10,000 per month for the Services.
The Contractor shall meet the following performance metrics: 99.9% uptime, response time under 5 minutes, and resolution time under 2 hours.
The Service Level Agreement ('SLA') is as follows: The Contractor shall ensure that the System is available 99.9% of the time in any given calendar month.
The Contractor's operational responsibilities include but are not limited to: system administration, software updates, and security monitoring.
The Contractor shall adhere to all applicable quality standards and acceptability criteria as set forth by the Customer.
The Contractor shall provide support and maintenance services during normal business hours.
Changes to this agreement must be made in writing and agreed upon by both parties.
There are no non-solicitation provisions in this agreement.
evidence: Effective Date is mentioned in multiple places indicating clear start date for services.
Performance metrics are clearly stated with specific targets.
Service Level Agreement is explicitly defined.
Quality standards and acceptance criteria are referenced.
Support and maintenance obligations are outlined.
